name: vanillapinchzoom
description: A fork of RTP Pinch Zoom without jQuery.

scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run min
scripts.test: echo "Maybe there will be tests one day..." && exit 0

contributors.name: Rhys Burnie
contributors.note: Forked due to the fact that the history so far has been flakey, don't want to risk it dissapearing from npm like other versions have

contributors.name: Jordan Gensler
contributors.note: apparently made the original native fork based on the jQuery plugin? hard to track, history missing
